events.name: Day 3 - IRAS Hackathon 2016
events.description: This is day 3 of a 3-day event hosted by UP Singapore and is being announced on behalf of our community member. Title: IRAS Hackathon 2016 Speakers: Various SMEs, Tech Mentors, Microsoft MVPs, see more at: http://www.upsingapore.com/events/iras-hackathon/#experts Abstract: UP Singapore is proud to announce the first ever IRAS Hackathon! In line with a nation-wide strategy to provide public services with a citizen-centric approach, IRAS would like to explore how to provide best-in-class tax experiences to Singapore’s taxpayers, using intuitive digital services. Learn more about the theme and opportunity areas of this hackathon at our Theme page here: http://bit.ly/iras-theme At the IRAS hackathon, you will have the chance to create and pitch your idea to a senior and distinguished panel of judges. Also, the winning team in both the Startup and Open Categories, will take home a cash prize of $3,000! Sign up now! http://bit.ly/2aXJMHg Learn more about the IRAS Hackathon 2016 here: http://bit.ly/iras-hackathon-2016 We are promoting this event because it aligns with our group interests. For deeper engagement with Apache Apex - follow ApacheApex, presentations, recordings, download (community, sandbox), Apache Apex releases, docs
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium, One Marina Boulevard, Level 21, 018989, Singapore
events.group_name: Apache Apex Next Gen Native Hadoop Big Data, Singapore
